name: 譚智宏
objective:
本課程為前一學期水文遙測之延續課程，將以遙測方法實際應用於水土防災問題解析。主要內容包含衛星影像特性、影像校正方法、影像分類、遙測方法結合水文模式於防災應用及專題討論。
本課程以先修習過水文遙測課程，具遙測物理機制概念之研究生為宜。
schedule:
1. Remote sensing and digitial image processing.
2. Remote sensing data collection.
3. Image quality assessment and statistical evaluation.
4. Geometric correction
5. Image enhancement.
6. Thematic information extraction.
7. Digital change detection.
8. Thematic map accuracy assessment.
scorePolicy: 上課表現及作業70%，期末報告30%。
materials:
Jensen, J. R. (2005) Introductory Digital Image Processing-A Remote Sensing Perspective.  Pearson Prentice Hall Education, Inc.
Engman, E.T. and R.J. Gurney (1991) Remote Sensing in Hydrology. Chapman and Hall. 
Jensen, J. R. (2000) Remote Sensing of the Environment: An Earth Resource Perspective. US Imports & PHIPEs. 
Lillesand, T. M. (2003) Remote sensing and image interpretation, 5th ed. John Wiley & Sons.
Campbell, J. B. (2002) Introduction to remote sensing, 3rd ed. The Guilford Press.
楊龍士，雷祖強，周天穎 (2006), 遙感探測理論與分析實務，文魁資訊出版。
李紀人，(2004) 衛星遙測於水資源工程之應用課程講義，中國水利水電科學研究院遙感技術應用中心。
